title: 01/07/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 01/07/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin defends Lamar Jackson and the notion that this is a must-win career game for him and gave his Top 5 people with the most pressure on them this weekend. Greg Cosell gave us his keys for every Wild Card Game and Joe Burrow talked about his rookie season and when we can expect him to be back on the field.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
